offence.title: Exceed a variable speed limit - automatic camera device
offence.sum: On 22/07/2019 at Sheffield in the county of South Yorkshire drove a mechanically propelled vehicle, being a vehicle, namely BMW index KLSO123, on a special road, namely M18-2234A J12 J13 Northbound, subject of regulations, namely The M18 Motorway (Junctions 12 to 23) (Variable Speed Limits) Regulations 2015, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour
offence.as: Contrary to the above regulations and section 17(2), (3) and (4) of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988
offence.sof: At 02:35 on 22/07/2019 the defendant drove a mechanically propelled vehicle, being a vehicle, namely BMW index KLSO123, on a special road, namely M18-2234A J12 J13 Northbound, subject of regulations, namely The M18 Motorway (Junctions 12 to 13) (Variable Speed Limits) Regulations 2015, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour. The speed, recorded by means of HAD20495 Highways Agency Digital Enforcement Camera System 9, was 86 mph.
offence.adjreason: To consider if there are mitigating circumstances (including exceptional hardship) for not ordering disqualification

offence.title: Speeding - motor vehicle - exceed 60 mph - automatic camera device
offence.sum: On 22/07/2019 at Sheffield in the county of South Yorkshire drove a mechanically propelled vehicle, being a vehicle, namely FORD index JUSO123, on a special road, namely M18-2234A J12 J13 Northbound, subject of regulations, namely The M18 Motorway (Junctions 12 to 23) (Variable Speed Limits) Regulations 2015, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour
offence.as: Contrary to the above regulations and section 17(2), (3) and (4) of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988
offence.sof: At 02:35 on 22/07/2019 the defendant drove a mechanically propelled vehicle, being a vehicle, namely FORD index JUSO123, on a special road, namely M18-2234A J12 J13 Northbound, subject of regulations, namely The M18 Motorway (Junctions 12 to 13) (Variable Speed Limits) Regulations 2015, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour. The speed, recorded by means of HAD20495 Highways Agency Digital Enforcement Camera System 9, was 86 mph.
offence.adjreason: To consider if there are mitigating circumstances (including exceptional hardship) for not ordering disqualification

offence.title: Speeding exceed 70 mph motorway limit manned equipment
offence.sum: On 14/10/2017 at Sheffield in the county of South Yorkshire drove a motor vehicle, namely BMW(CARS) 316 index H567GG, on a motorway, namely M1 Motorway (South) between junctions 37 and 33, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour
offence.as: Contrary to the above regulations and section 17(2), (3) and (4) of the Road Traffic Regulation Act 1984 and Schedule 2 to the Road Traffic Offenders Act 1988
offence.sof: At 02:35 on 22/07/2019 the defendant drove a mechanically propelled vehicle, being a vehicle, namely BMW(CARS) 316 index H567GG, on a special road, namely M18-2234A J12 J13 Northbound, subject of regulations, namely The M18 Motorway (Junctions 12 to 13) (Variable Speed Limits) Regulations 2015, at a speed exceeding 70 miles per hour. The speed, recorded by means of HAD20495 Highways Agency Digital Enforcement Camera System 9, was 86 mph.
offence.adjreason: To consider if there are mitigating circumstances (including exceptional hardship) for not ordering disqualification

offence.title: Theft from a shop
offence.sum: Between 11/03/2018 and 15/05/2018 at BARNSLEY in the county of BARNSLEY, stole 9 items of clothing, to the value of £256.50, belonging to Dixon's
offence.as: section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.
offence.adjreason: For a pre-sentence report to be prepared.

offence.title: Fail to surrender to police / court bail at the appointed time
offence.sum: On 11/05/2019 at Sheffield Magistrates Court failed without reasonable cause to surrender to custody at Sheffield Magistrates' Court, having been released on bail in criminal proceedings on 23/03/2019 at Sheffield Magistrates Court
offence.as: section 1(1) and 7 of the Theft Act 1968.
offence.adjreason: For a pre-sentence report to be prepared.

case.bailcond: Assessments/Reports: undergo an assessment conducted by AS DIRECTED for dependency on Class A drugs and participate in any follow-up

offence.title: Harassment without violence
offence.sum: Between 09/01/2018 and 16/03/2019 at ROTHERHAM in the county of south Yorkshire pursued a course of conduct which amounted to the harassment of Roger Rabbit and which you knew or ought to have known amounted to the harassment of him in that between the dates shown you sent 2 SMS messages, left 2,000 voicemail messages and made unwanted phone calls
offence.as: Contrary to section 2(1) and (2) of the Protection from Harassment Act 1997.

offence.title: Commission of a further offence during the operational period of a suspended sentence order
offence.sum: Commission of a further offence during the operational period of a suspended sentence order made by SHEFFIELD MAGISTRATES COURT on 13/11/2017 for the offences of HARASSMENT X4
offence.as: Contrary to section 2(1) and (2) of the Protection from Harassment Act 1997.

offence.title: Use threatening / abusive / insulting words / behaviour with intent to cause fear of provoke unlawful violence
offence.sum: On 12/11/2018 at Sheffield in the county of South Yorkshire used towards mickey mouse threatening, abusive or insulting words or behaviour with intent to cause that person to believe that immediate unlawful violence would be used against him by any person, or to provoke the immediate use of unlawful violence by him whereby that person was likely believe that violence would be used, or it was likely that such violence would be provoked
offence.as: Contrary to section 4(1) and (4) of the Public Order Act 1986.

offence.as: Contrary to section 2(1) and (2) of the Protection from Harassment Act 1997.

offence.title: Application to revoke a community order without re-sentencing
offence.sum: Application to revoke a community order (without re-sentencing) made by Sheffield Magistrates' Court on 09/11/2018 on the ground that the Order is unworkable du to time spent in custody. CJS Code (most serious original offence) Criminal Damage (£5000 or less) and Malicious Damage 14900.
offence.as: In accordance with Part 3 of Schedule 8 to the Criminal Justice Act 2003.

offence.as: Contrary to section 363(2) and (4) of the Communications Act 2003.
